Our lifestyles, workstyles, and activities have been challenged.

WorkFence is a suite of secure, smartphone based software tools which will help in facing these challenges.

WorkFence is a tool for shared workspaces/ factories, places where co-workers are required to be together for work. It will monitor Social Distancing at workplaces, during work hours. It will capture every event of not distancing, so as to train workforce/ teams to work-collaborate with distancing. Workfence takes no personal information, shares no data (except with designated administrators in organisation). Workfence monitors only at designated place of work, at designated work times.The system is developed by using BLE (BlueTooth Low energy protocol), and advanced, robust algorithms. The WorkFence mobile app is developed by technocrats with two decades of experience, along with a team of bright students from IIT Madras, developing this proprietary algorithm with complex mathematical modeling

We do not collect any location data, except for the purposes of ensuring that the person is inside company premises while marking his/her attendance (Accuracy: +/- 500 meters radius). We do not ‘track’ people.

The identification of close contact between two people is done through Bluetooth. All these services are only activated when the user swipes right- starts office hours, and ends when the user swipes left.

All data is stored on secure cloud servers, and all employee or employer privacy related norms are respected and followed strictly. All data is stored or deleted at the employers option.

Read more out our data policy, and how WorkFence operates at www.workfence.in

Disclaimer: WorkFence is an employee training and monitoring tool to ensure the implementation of distancing at workplaces. It is not a medical or diagnostic tool.
